title: Miracle Girls, Vol. 1
description: Identical twin Toni and Mika have a secret... they have psychic powers! They can communicate with each other telepathically, and when they're together, they can teleport. When tom-boy Toni switches places with brainy Mika, comic and romantic mishaps ensue. Mika's creepy science teacher, Mr. K., is onto their secret and follows them around with a camera trying to get proof.
author: Nami Akimoto
